---
title: "About this site"
description: |
  This is the website for the paper, "PreciseDist: An Unsupervised Ensemble Learning Framework for Clustering and Visualization."
---

While this website contains code examples of PreciseDist based on the analysis of flow cytometry data in the context of systemic autoimmune diseases, this is the PreciseDist package website.    
  
Please visit the following website for comprehensive code-examples of PreciseDist in action:    
  
https://github.com/bmuchmore/PreciseDist
